name: Apart Alpinschlössl
description:
Vacation Apartments in Mayrhofen in Zillertal - Tyrol
Feel welcome from the first moment on … In the heart of the Zillertal Alps, where only the rays of sunshine cut through the crystal-clear mountain air, we offer you vacation apartments for 2 - 6 people. In Mayrhofen/Zillertal, a veritable vacation paradise is just waiting to be discovered by you! 

A true El Dorado for guests who love something out of the ordinary… 

Holidays in Mayrhofen with a special feeling
That feeling is something we call passion, zest for life, excitement, a sense of ease, along with tradition and hospitality from the heart! 

Atmosphere, impressions and magical scenery in each and every season, ready to whisk you away from the old daily routine… 

Vacation apartments for top vacation quality 
Our vacation apartments promise the ultimate in vacation quality, reflecting a unique combination of the traditional and modern. Whether as a couple, family or in a group - each vacation apartment fulfills your personal lifestyle wishes, especially since all of the apartments come with the convenience of being able to add an extra double room! 

Magical Location in Mayrhofen in Zillertal
Our dream location makes us a base for days that are a dream unto themselves - close to the center of popular tourism destination, Mayrhofen - and when it comes to summer activities and the joys of skiing, you are just a 3-minute drive from the valley terminal for lifts up to Mayrhofen's ski area and "Ski Zillertal 3000" – the biggest ski area in Zillertal valley. 

Open yourself to the inspiration. Experience first-hand the captivating atmosphere here in the midst of Zillertal's alpine world, and those unique views from our south-facing balcony of the magical alpine panoramas. 

Regardless of whether you are a first-time guest here with us or a "regular", our brand of "Zillertal hospitality" promises a luxury that doesn't cost one cent, but one that is worth so very much… 

Finding time for what makes life special, and reenergizing yourself for what lies ahead - at the ALPINSCHLÖSSL- Your guarantee for a well-earned timeout in Mayrhofen in Zillertal! 

Sincerely,
from the Zillertal

Reisen macht Spass mit Pia und Dirk
and
Familie Schösser

included bedlinen and towels.
bread and rolls service dails, separate charge


additional costs:
- local tax 1,50 € per person and day
- final cleaning 50 - 80 € per appartement
- brackage caution 200 € per appartement

included bedlinen and towels.
bread and rolls service dails, separate charge


additional costs:
- local tax 1,50 € per person and day
- final cleaning 40 - 60 € per appartement
- brackage caution 200 € per appartement
B169 in the direction of Mayrhofen, turn off towards the Erlebnissennerei (dairy) - 200m in the opposite direction and just past the Bruggerstube restaurant turn left.

Alpinschloessl Apartement
Alpinschloessl Mayrhofen
accomodation Mayrhofen

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
Luxury Vacation Apartment TOWER CASTLE
48 m², apartment for 2-3 people - new construction 
The goal of our house remodeling efforts and the exclusive amenities of our TOWER CASTLE apartment was to achieve perfection in form, a stylish ambience and an ideal touch. 
A vacation oasis for the discerning guest. 

As beautiful as a luxury home in its own right. 
A place to make your dreams come true, the "TOWER CASLE"...
Please note: no pets allowed. 
Amenities:
1 double bedroom with canopy bed 
1 build-in standard single bed in the combination living room and kitchen area 
Shower and separate WC, hairdryer, cosmetics wipes, soap dispenser 
Modern kitchen amenities, high-quality crockery, cutlery, cookware, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker with filters, toaster, electric kettle, refrigerator/freezer etc… 
All-wood corner seating in the living room/kitchen area with tiled stove 
Safe, CD-player, 2 x flat-screen satellite TV, wireless Internet 
Allergen-free beds, hand and bath towels, table decor and kitchen towels, allergy-tested air-clean carpet in the bedroom 
South-facing individual terrace with magnificent scenic views

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Luxury Vacation Apartment ALPINE KING
58 m², vacation apartment for 2-4 people - new construction
The goal of our house remodeling efforts and the exclusive amenities of our ALPINE KING apartment was to achieve perfection in form, a stylish ambience and an ideal touch. 
Take a vacation, feel on top of the world, 
like the "King of the Alps"! 

Please note: no pets allowed!
Amenities:
1 three-bed room with canopy bed 
1 standard double bed in the combination living room and kitchen area 
Shower and separate WC, hairdryer, cosmetics wipes, soap dispenser 
Modern kitchen amenities, high-quality crockery, cutlery, cookware, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker with filters, toaster, electric kettle, refrigerator/freezer etc… 
All-wood corner seating in the living room/kitchen area with tiled stove 
Safe, CD-player, 2 x flat-screen satellite TV, wireless Internet, automatic blinds 
Allergen-free beds, hand and bath towels, table decor and kitchen towels, allergy-tested air-clean carpet in the bedroom 
Option to expand with additional double room in the main building 
South-facing individual terrace with magnificent scenic views

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Feel-Good Vacation Apartment MAPLE
68 m², vacation apartment for 2-4 people - 1st floor / south side
This apartment represents a combination of traditional and modern .... when it comes to the quality of living space, the guest encounters no limits! A spacious apartment, custom combinations possible depending on the number of guests – with min. 4/5 people, also bookable with 1 separate comfort doubleroom!

Amenities:
1 three-bed room with solid wood, hand-carpentered furnishings 
1 built-in, standard bed in the combination living room and kitchen 
1 spacious corner seating featuring solid woods, including a wide bench recliner 
Cloakroom with sink 
2 x shower/ 2 x WC, hairdryer, makeup cloths, soap dispenser 
Kitchen area with complete crockery, cutlery cookware, microwave, coffee maker with filters, toaster, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer, etc.… 
Safe, 2x flat-screen satellite TV, radio and alarm, wireless Internet 
Allergen-free beds, hand and bath towels, table decor and kitchen towels 
Magnificent panoramic views from the balcony, balcony furniture 
Option to expand with an additional double room = right next to the apartment

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
Luxury Vacation Apartment ALPINE PARADISE
48 m², vacation apartment for 2-3 people – 1st floor / south side
The apartment has been designed to meet the wishes of the discerning guest, and was immediately awarded the Provincial Seal of Quality. Special attention was paid to creating a stylish and individual ambience in the bedroom, featuring all the comforts and an exclusive shower/WC. New living room/kitchen design featuring a tiled stove, dishwasher etc...
As of 2014: Luxury apartment "Alpine Paradise", an apartment that justifiably bears its name!
1 four-poster bed – with sofa that can be converted into a full bed, 
1 spacious, solid-wood corner seating with tiled stove and broad recliner bench 
Kitchen with 4-ring Ceran range, crockery, cutlery, cookware, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker with filters, electric kettle, refrigerator/freezer 
Shower/ WC, hairdryer, makeup cloths, soap dispenser 
Safe, 2x flat-screen satellite TV, radio and alarm, wireless Internet 
Allergen-free beds, hand and bath towels. table decor and kitchen towels 
Magnificent panoramic balcony on the south side, including balcony furniture 
Option to expand for up to 4/5 people with an additional double room = right next to the apartment

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Vacation Apartment ALPINE REST
68 m², vacation apartment for 2-4 people – 1st floor / south-west side
The name actually says EVERYTHING ... Rest, unwind and feel great in an apartment that is home to genuine Tyrolean tradition - in combination with modern comforts.
Amenities:
1 double bedroom with solid oak furniture 
1 bedroom – 2 separate beds 
1 entrance hall with cloakroom 
Kitchen with Ceran range, crockery, cutlery, cookware, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker with filters, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer 
1 spacious corner seating in solid wood, tiled stove and a broad bench recliner 
Shower/ separate WC, hairdryer, makeup cloths, soap dispenser 
Safe, big flat-screen satellite TV, CD-player, wireless Internet 
Panoramic window and beautiful balcony-terrace with south-west view 
Allergen-free beds, hand and bath towels, table decor and kitchen towels

makesOffer.description:
Feel-Good Vacation Apartment EAGLE'S NEST
62 m², vacation apartment for 2-3 people – 2nd floor / south side
Day after day enjoy magical views of our alpine world from your scenic balcony, quickly forgetting the grey daily routine in a cozy, welcoming atmosphere… A spacious apartment, custom combinations possible depending on the number of guests – with min. 4/5 people, also bookable with 2 separate bedrooms!
Amenities:
1 three-bed room, all-wood furnishings 
Entrance hall with cloakroom and separate WC 
Shower / WC, hairdryer, makeup cloths, soap dispenser 
Kitchen with complete equipment, microwave, coffee maker with filters, toaster, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer etc… 
Safe, CD-player, flat-screen satellite TV with radio and alarm, wireless Internet 
Allergen-free beds, hand and bath towels, table decor and kitchen towels 
South-side panoramic balcony along the length of the living area 
Option to expand with an additional double room = right next to the apartment

makesOffer.name: Apartment, bath, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
Luxury Vacation Superior-Suite ALPINE ROMANCE
72 m², vacation apartment for 2-6 people – newly renovated in 2013 - 2nd floor / west side.
This apartment was designed to appeal to the wishes of the discerning guest, and has befittingly been awarded the Provincial Seal of Quality for Apartments. Special attention was placed in creating a stylish, individual ambience for the living spaces.
Amenities:
1 double bedroom with water bed and walk-in closet 
1 double room with all-wood furniture 
1 exclusive living room with spacious corner seating and tiled stove, maple parquet flooring 
Loggia with sliding window combination - integrated winter garden effect / panoramic view 
1 bathroom with shower/bath, WC, hairdryer, makeup mirror-cloths, soap dispenser 
Kitchen with 4-ring Ceran range, crockery, cutlery, cookware, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker withfilters, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer, cloakroom 
Safe, CD-player, big flat-screen satellite TV, wireless Internet 
Allergen-free beds, hand and bath towels, table decor and kitchen towels 
Option to expand with additional double room = right next to the apartment
